DOC.criteria: Signed informed consent Male female 18 year age older Negative pregnancy test woman childbearing potential Hemoglobin > 12.5 g/dl measure day participation Negative urine nicotine test Pregnancy breastfeed Weight < 50 kg History anemia require blood transfusion , erythropoietin supplementation , iron supplementation within past 36 month Known hemoglobin < 12.5 g/dl within past 90 day Systolic blood pressure > 180 mmHg and/or diastolic blood pressure > 100 mmHg Poor venous access Large volume blood donation ( > 200 ml 7 ounce ) within previous 56 day ( e.g . blood donation purpose blood banking ) Clinically significant cardiac , hemostatic neurological impairment significant medical condition , opinion investigator would affect subject safety ( e.g. , recent myocardial infarction , history prolong bleeding time , cerebral vascular accident , advance cancer uncontrolled medical condition ) Psychiatric cognitive disturbance illness would affect subject safety Current smoker
